import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{convertNumber}from'./GlobalFunction';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TableRow(props){var input=props.input,placeholder=props.placeholder;var history=useHistory();var handleClick=function handleClick(){history.push('/info/'+input.name);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{onClick:handleClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:input.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:input.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:input.chain}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:input.lastExploited}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:!placeholder?input.usdTVL:"$ "+convertNumber(input.usdTVL,false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:!placeholder?input.usdTVLChanged:convertNumber(input.usdTVLChanged,true)+" %"})]});}function TableHeadRow(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Chain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Last Exploit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Locked(USD)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"%Change"})]});}function ListTable(props){var input=props.input,filter=props.filter,placeholder=props.placeholder;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHeadRow,{}),input.map(function(element){if(filter==="All"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{input:element,placeholder:placeholder});}else if(filter===element.category){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{input:element,placeholder:placeholder});}return null;})]});}export default ListTable;/*
